item.title: Stealc Malware Analysis
item.author: Glyc3rius
item.description: This sample of Stealc infostealer targets browsers, extensions, desktop cryptocurrency wallets and applications such as Outlook, Steam, Discord, Telegram, Tox, and Pidgin. It also gathers information about the victim's machine. Several anti-analysis methods are applied while strings are obfuscated with base64 and RC4.
